title: Children and Belongings in Tow, Ukrainians Throng Borders Fleeing Russian Invasion
sub_head: Tens of thousands of Ukrainians have already crossed into Poland and other neighboring countries in an exodus the UN says could grow to four million
body:
MEDYKA, Poland—Ukrainians fleeing the Russian invasion began streaming Friday into European Union nations, in what neighboring countries expect to become an exodus of more than one million people in the coming days.
A nearly immobile line of cars more than 30 miles long logged the roads leading to Ukraine’s border with Poland, with many people abandoning their vehicles in the hopes it would be quicker to walk five or six hours in the intermittent rain.
